Name: Spring Bow
LongDescription: Raises the chance of finding money after defeating enemies. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Spoink and Grumpig.  Finding a Spring Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
